title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
Step 1 On the message editing screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154507390001.png) , and compose your message.   
 Step 2 Choose the recipient.   
 Step 3 (Optional) Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154519513001.png) > Add subject. The message then changes to a multimedia message.   
 Step 4 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154546891001.png) to add pictures, audio clips, or videos to the message.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154557312001.png) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154609449001.png) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154622751001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154635707001.png)

Step 5 When you are done, touch .![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924154656118001.png)
